data.name: Colosseum + Characters DLC / コンテンツ追加パック５ / 鬥技場 + 角色DLC
data.detailed_description:
With the Colosseum + Characters DLC, you can explore all of Re;birth 1 with the addition of three new characters (Kei Jinguji, Mina Nishizawa, Chika Hakozaki) and new Colosseum quests and rewards for those looking for a challenge!

The Colosseum + Characters Bundle include*:
• Kei Jinguji, Mina Nishizawa, and Chika Hakozaki as playable characters
• 15 additional Colosseum battles
• Special weapon rewards exclusive to new Colosseum battles

*Note: You will need to progress to Chapter 2 to access additional content. If on your 2nd playthrough or beyond, you must progress to Chapter 2. If this DLC event has already been viewed, it will not occur again. The Colosseum must be unlocked to access new battles.
data.about_the_game:
With the Colosseum + Characters DLC, you can explore all of Re;birth 1 with the addition of three new characters (Kei Jinguji, Mina Nishizawa, Chika Hakozaki) and new Colosseum quests and rewards for those looking for a challenge!

The Colosseum + Characters Bundle include*:
• Kei Jinguji, Mina Nishizawa, and Chika Hakozaki as playable characters
• 15 additional Colosseum battles
• Special weapon rewards exclusive to new Colosseum battles

*Note: You will need to progress to Chapter 2 to access additional content. If on your 2nd playthrough or beyond, you must progress to Chapter 2. If this DLC event has already been viewed, it will not occur again. The Colosseum must be unlocked to access new battles.
data.short_description: The Colosseum + Characters DLC brings three additional characters (Kei Shinguji, Mina Nishizawa, Chika Hakozaki) and new Colosseum-exclusive battles + weapon drops.

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth1 / 超次次元遊戲戰機少女重生1

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version
